structure.unit: STATE UNIVERSITIES AND COLLEGES -- REGIONAL EDUCATION -- ARCHAEOLOGY

law.catch_line: Needs assessment for adult education and workforce development.
law.text: The Council on Postsecondary Education, in consultation with the Kentucky Adult Education Program and the Collaborative Center for Literacy Development: Early Childhood through Adulthood, shall assess the need for technical assistance, training, and other support to assist in the development of adult education and workforce development that support the state strategic agenda and that include a comprehensive coordinated approach to education and training services. The council shall promote the involvement of universities; colleges; technical institutions; elementary and secondary educational agencies; labor, business, and industry representatives; community-based organizations; citizens' groups; and other policymakers in the development of the regional strategies.
law.history: Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 211, sec. 103, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 526, secs. 5 and 28, effective July 14, 2000. -- Created 1997 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 23, effective May 30, 1997.
